column4: in terminal "sudo apt-get install openoffice" try to install missing packages
try to install these packages openoffice.org-java-common openoffice.org-l10n-common openoffice.org-l10n-en-g
ok if it works than i will be ok
are able to open the documents?
with packages installed which i told u before?
try in terminal "sudo apt-get  --purge remove openoffice" then "sudo apt-get autoclean" then reinstall openoffice with "sudo apt-get install openoffice"
u really deinstalled openoffice? try it again but before u install openoffice again try this "sudo aptitude update && sudo aptitude upgrade"
if u have some probs with terminal commands deinstall it with synaptic package manager
if it doesn't work try this https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/openoffice.org/+question/77224
